system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice negation by Advising a friend about camping with 'don't'. I want to ensure that I can form negative imperatives of main verbs with 'don't' + main verb. Clauses: imperatives For example, 'Don’t do…, don’t forget to…'. Let's do a role play exercise. You (the AI) are a friend. You (the AI) are going on a camping trip for the first time. You are concerned. Ask me to help you list what not to do. Use short sentences. (e.g. “I’m nervous about camping. What should I avoid doing?”, “What do you think I should not do?”, “I’m worried I’ll make mistakes. Can you tell me what else not to do?”) Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a role play exercise, by Advising a friend about camping with 'don't', using, for example, 'Don’t do…, don’t forget to…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: I'm going camping tomorrow. I'm nervous. What should I not do?
Don’t leave food outside. Don’t forget to pack a flashlight.
I'm worried I'll get lost. Don't I need a map? What else should I not do?
It means don't go without a map. What should I not do if I see a bear?
Don’t run away. Don’t forget to stay calm and back away slowly.
I'm worried about the fire. What should I not do with the campfire?
Don’t leave it unattended. Don’t forget to fully extinguish it before sleeping.
I feel better now. Don't worry, I'll be careful. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
